name: Endless Ruin Chapter I: Toward The Endless Ruin
name_original: Endless Ruin Chapter I: Toward The Endless Ruin
description:
Endless Ruin Chapter I:
Toward The Endless Ruin

an interactive music video

Please play with the sound on, as music is a primary component of the experience. This game was made utilizing the principles of hypnowave. Changes in consciousness may occur when playing or listening.

-Made with Bitsy

-Made with assets from the Bitsy Dungeon Tiles asset pack by enui

-uses the Bitsy Corrupt hack by Sean S. Leblanc

-music added using the Bitsy Audio tool by Mark Wonnacott

-music, writing, and everything else by (is)
